    • Method Detail

      • lock

        public static Lock lock(Lock lock)
        Returns locked lock. Uses Lock.tryLock() with timeout of 60 seconds to avoid potential deadlocks.

      • read

        public static Lock read(ReadWriteLock guard)
        Returns locked read-lock.

      • readWith

        public static <V> V readWith(ReadWriteLock guard,

        Returns locked write-lock.
